label: Waspeed
tab_all_popover: This system is automatically updated to include all chats
tab_unread_popover: This system tab updates automatically to include all the unread chats
tab_awaiting_reply_popover: This system tab updates automatically to include all chats awaiting others' replies
tab_needs_reply_popover: This system tab updates automatically to include all chats awaiting your reply
tab_groups_popover: This system updates automatically to include all group chats
tab_1_1_popover: This system tab updates automatically to include all chats with individual contacts
tab_official_accounts_popover: This system tab updates automatically to include all chats with official accounts
tab_broadcasts_popover: This system tab updates automatically to include all the broadcast lists
tab_custom_tab_popover: This is a custom tab. You can add or remove chats from it yourself
tab_setting_edit: Add or Remove contacts from tab
tab_delete_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this tab?
tab_delete_system_text: Once you delete this system tab, you cannot add it back. Consider reordering tabs instead
tab_delete_user_text: Once you delete it, you will lose all the selected tabs in this chat
add_to_tab_heading: Add or remove Chat to Tabs
add_to_tab_text: Select the tab(s) you want to add or remove this chat to
edit_chats_heading: Add or remove contacts to tab
edit_chats_text: Select chats to add or remove from the tab
edit_chats_search_placeholder: Search chats by Name or Number
copy_chats_text: Select chats to copy from this tab
reminder_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder?
reminder_create_text: Once a Reminder is set, we will notify you at your chosen time. Reminders can be found under notifications on the top bar
note_placeholder: Take a note for this chat
note_delete_msg: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
start_chat_popover: Start chatting with someone not on your list
start_chat_text: Initiate a chat with a contact not on your list
upgrade_modal_caption: Upgrade Waspeed to get unlimited access to all amazing features
upgrade_modal_quota_expired: You've exhausted your free resources, Please purchase premium to get unlimited access to all features
free_campanha: Bulk campaign sending limited to 5 contacts
license_activate_modal_caption: Enter your license key to activate Waspeed Premium
license_activate_success: Your license has been activated, Enjoy Waspeed Premium!
licenese_activate_error: There was an error with your license activation, Please make sure the license key is correct and retry
create_link_caption: Generate a personalized WhatsApp link with a predefined message

event_auth_error: Google auth failed, Please try again
event_save_error: There was an error saving the event, Please try again
event_link_msg: I have booked an event. Add it to your Google Calendar:
campaign_step_one_desc: Select contacts to send message to
import_tooltip: The CSV file must have a single column with numbers (one per row). The numbers must contain the country code, for example. 5531987231002
campaign_no_chats_err: Please select contact(s) to send message to
campaign_warning: Please use this functionality with caution, Bulk sending of messages can get your account banned on WhatsApp. Waspeed is not responsible for any damages to your WhatsApp account.
campaign_warning_approve: I understand that the usage of this functionality, without caution, can get my WhatsApp account banned. Waspeed will have no responsibility for any damage to my account
campaign_not_accepted_err: Please accept the terms to continue
modalDes: Insert the tags to be changing the formatting of the text and thus be making your personalized submissions, just put it at the moment you want to be personalizing, remembering that it is important to use the # at the beginning of the tag
name: Name
modalNome: Insert the name of the contact saved or extracted from the list
modalSaudacao: Includes random greetings, as well as: {Hi, Hello, What's up}, {How are you?, How are you?}
agendaDesc: Schedule a message for this contact
AdiquiraPremium: Purchase the premium version for unlimited access to this feature
selecionarTodosFree: * Select all only available in premium version
selecionar5NaFree: Limit of selected contacts per tab reached (Maximum 5 contacts)
etiquetaImpFree: Import contacts from a tag only available in premium version
exportTabFree: * Copy contacts to another Tab only available in premium version
exportContats: * Purchase the premium version to export contacts
modal_Ass_Desc: Sign your name when sending a message and know which attendant is talking or has talked to your customer, for example:
finalizar_error: Error, leave at least one option active to finalize the attendance
hashtagNome_Title: Click here to add the contact's name to the text
hashtagNome_error: This contact doesn't have a name
campain_modal_instruction2: Position your contacts in the following format
campain_modal_instruction3: After completing, save and import to our system
campain_modal_dicas1: It is important that contacts have
campain_modal_dicas2: country codes are automatically inserted, for international contacts enter the respective codes

campain_modal_dicas32: and import it, after importing just import it directly into our system
campain_type_Title1: Searches for all groups you participate in on WhatsApp
campain_type_Title2: Searches for all contacts from the groups you participate in on WhatsApp
campain_type_Title3: Searches for all contacts from created tabs

campain_variaveis_import: Click here to add the variable to your creation message

alert_free_aba: * Premium version required to export tab
resetar_chave_titulo: Do you really want to reset your key?
resetar_chave_removendo_text: Now you can activate it on another machine. The backup of Waspeed related to the settings of this machine has been sent to your own WhatsApp number. To activate Waspeed on another machine with the same settings, just import the backup file on the new machine you will use.
resetar_chave_title: Click here to reset your activation key
chave_ativacao_title: Click here to copy your activation key
init_alert_msg: To make the plugin work correctly, remove any other WhatsApp Web plugin you have installed.
agendarMsg_alert: Attention: it is necessary to have WhatsApp open at least 10 minutes before the messages are sent
watidyFuncoesOpenClose: Click here to open/close this tab

msg_rapidas_notEmpy: There are no quick messages registered

CRM_freeTeste: Get the premium version to access the beta test of this feature.
CRM_FreeAlerta: Attention, upon purchasing the premium version, the CRM will be available for testing only. To access the CRM, you will need to purchase the premium version along with the CRM module.
CRM_alert_Modulo: This is a beta feature made available for testing! At this moment, this feature may have some bugs, which will be addressed once identified. New functionalities will be included in this CRM module. After homologation, this feature will be an optional module for contracting.

CRM_limiteAbas: Limit of contacts listed in tabs
